name: Balloon Madness
description:
Balloon Madness is my entry to the GXC #NoticeMe Game Jam! The theme of the jam is "Then the night changed everything". My game is set in a building at a carnival where the clown who stole your money runs his puppet shows. There are currently 3 levels. Try to get back as much money as you can.

Note: you cannot currently get hurt by anything in the game, this will change. I'm looking for feedback on how the game plays, especially the timing of events.

Left/Right arrows to move. Z to fire your slingshot.

A lot of the artwork is placeholder and it should be obvious which of it is more finished. My artistic ability is a bit lacking, but I'm trying my best.

Only available for Windows right now but it will have a Mac version as well.
